Interface Conversation.ConversationListener

Enclosing class:

public static interface Conversation.ConversationListener

Method Summary
 void OnMessage(SkypeObject obj, Message message)
          Called for each message in currently loaded conversations
 void OnParticipantListChange(SkypeObject obj)
          This callback gets fired when participants join or leave the conversation.
 void OnPropertyChange(SkypeObject obj, Conversation.PROPERTY prop, java.lang.Object value)
          This event gets called when there are changes to Conversation properties defined in Conversation.PROPERTY
 void OnSpawnConference(SkypeObject obj, Conversation spawned)
          This callback gets fired when a new Conversation is created using SpawnConference.
